text.data: Granbelos Empire[end1]
Emperor Sauzer has spoken with a Holy Dragon...[end]

Citizens of the Empire...
Emperor Sauzer has risked his life to challenge the legend of the Holy Dragons.[end]
In doing so, he has collapsed from exhaustion. However, there is no need to worry...[end]

The Emperor's wish for a new era...
We, the Granbelos Empire, shall become the supreme ruler of the new era...[end]
Granbelos Castle[end]

Gudolf: Did you see that? The citizens' unease? The pitifulness of Palpaleos?!
The only one who rightfully suits the podium is I, Gudolf!
A new era... in other words, my era!!
Sauzer has been defeated! I will show the people of the Empire what it means to be a truly strong man![end]

The emperor of Granbelos... The ruler of the world...
All the status! All the power!
All will be mine![end]

Donfan: Hello, ladies! 'Tis I, Donfan!
You shouldn't fight all the time. I can't stand to see your beautiful smiles on the battlefield... I'll show you what a true battle is! The wounds of passion, the pains of love... Just this once, with me...[end]
Donfan, 48 so far![end]

Donfan: Hello, red-haired lady! 'Tis I, Donfan!
How about escaping from this gloomy castle and taking a trip with me into the sky? There I will show you my dream to make you a princess.[end]
Granbelos General Persona Hobby: Cleaning[end]
Donfan, 69 so far![end]

Donfan: Hello, nicest lady in the Empire! How about taking a trip into the sky with me? Even though I may not look like it, I'm actually the captain of a large ship!
It's called [character][0x1], but if you'd like, I can name it after you! Let's start with your name. What is it?[end]
General Babarela?! What a coincidence... I was once called the General of Love long ago! Any hobbies?[end]

Whips... Uh... um... I see... So you like whips...
What type of man do you like?[end]

Men who are silent and train hard in swordsmanship...
......
People say I'm a poor speaker.
What are your measurements? Can you tell me where you're going?[end]
Granbelos General Irvine Hobby: Sword training[end]
Donfan, 100![end]
Donfan's name echoed throughout the Empire.[end]
Palpaleos: !! Who's there?![end]

Who are you...?!
I remember seeing that beard somewhere before...[end]

Taicho: I am a traveler... A battlefield salesman...
I must have the wrong room...[end]
Palpaleos: ...? I've heard that voice before...[end]
Taicho: No, we have never met before! ...General Palpaleos...[end]
Taicho: ......[end]
Palpaleos: Wait![end]
Palpaleos: Very well... Come in, traveler. I feel like talking to somebody.[end]

Palpaleos: ...I'm just thinking of a girl I left far away.
Do you know what I mean?[end]
Taicho: I think I understand... I too have a wife that is very far away...[end]
Palpaleos: I see... Even now... You can't forget her?[end]

Taicho: Her name is Celine... I do not want to forget her...
However... I am a coward. Sometimes I think about the day when I will not remember her anymore...[end]
Palpaleos: I'm envious... Does that mean she's still alive?[end]
Palpaleos: Traveler... you may go.[end]

Traveler, please listen.
If you ever run into the Resistance somewhere, I want you to tell a certain girl something for me... Her name is... [character][0x1].[end]

Tell her...
[0x24]I will forget about you...[0x22][end]
Taicho: I will make sure to tell her.[end]
Palpaleos: Traveler... I hope we meet again sometime...[end]

Taicho: I would not want to meet you on the battlefield...
Farewell![end]
Soldier: Emperor Gudolf! Where's the corpse?[end]

Gudolf: Corpse...?
Gwahaha...
You will take the place of Sauzer![end]
Gudolf: Gwahaha... Hurry up with the preparations! The people are waiting! Waiting for the Emperor's sad little funeral![end]

The death of an emperor...
The death of a single man...
It is merely that, and nothing more...[end]

The Granbelos Empire...
The foreshadow of destrustion...[end][end]
